tool.name: Get.coremicrobiome
tool.description: fraction of OTUs for samples or abundances
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py #set results = ["'^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'" + $logfile.__str__, "'^\S+\.core\.microbiome$:'" + $core_microbiome.__str__] --cmd='get.coremicrobiome' --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' #if isinstance($otu.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('shared').__class__): --shared="$otu" #elif isinstance($otu.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('relabund').__class__): --relabund="$otu" #end if #if $label.__str__ != "None" and len($label.__str__) > 0: --label="$label" #end if #if $groups.__str__ != "None" and len($groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$groups" #end if #if len($abundance.__str__) > 0 or len($samples.__str__) > 0: #if len($abundance.__str__) > 0: --abundance="$abundance" #end if #if len($samples.__str__) > 0: --samples="$samples" #end if #set results = $results + ["'^\S+\.core\.microbiomelist$:'" + $core_microbiomelist.__str__] #end if --result=#echo ','.join($results)

param.name: otu
param.label: shared or relabund - OTU Shared or Relabund

param.name: abundance
param.label: abundance - list OTU names at this abundance

param.name: samples
param.label: samples - minimum number of samples requied to list OTU names

validator.message: between 1 and number of samples in your file

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.coremicrobiome_ command determines the fraction of OTUs that are found in varying numbers of samples for different minimum relative abundances.
.. _get.coremicrobiome: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.coremicrobiome
v1.27.0: Updated to Mothur 1.33
